QuestData.Title: The Underground Menace
QuestData.Description: Lion killer, chicken chaser, new Frenzyheart slave...$B$BI know you no want to stay slave, so I tell you what to do. Show you better than the other Frenzyheart hunters and then Rakjak respect you.$B$BUnder sands of south river there a beast that kills wasp, apes, and even wolvar. He called Serfex. You bring claw of Serfex to Rakjak and maybe he release you from slaveness.$B$BHope Dajik teaching you good so Serfex be easy stuff.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Serfex under the sands of the southern river, slay him, and bring his claw to High-Shaman Rakjak at Frenzyheart Hill.$B$BIf you lose Dajik's Worn Chalk, speak to Elder Harkek in Frenzyheart Hill.
QuestData.CompletionText: I not ask for you, $r. What you want?
QuestData.RewardText: You kill Serfex? I bet you follow mighty wolvar that kill Serfex and take claw.$B$BMy claw now.
